mapper.sql: a.id, a.username, a.password, a.salt, a.id_card, a.birthday, a.sex, a.status, a.email, a.mobile, a.dept_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user (id, username, password, nickname, id_card, birthday, sex, status, salt, email, mobile, dept_id, create_by, create_date, del_flag) VALUES (#{id}, #{username}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{idCard}, #{birthday}, #{sex}, #{status}, #{salt}, #{email}, #{mobile}, #{deptId}, #{create_by}, #{create_date}, #{del_flag})
mapper.update: update t_user set id_card = #{idCard}, birthday = #{birthday}, sex = #{sex}, status = #{status}, nickname = #{nickname}, email = #{email}, mobile = #{mobile}, dept_id = #{deptId}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_date = #{updateDate} where id = #{id}
